text: William Chase Taubman (born November 13, 1941) is an American political scientist. He is known for writing Khrushchev: The Man and His Era. It won the Pulitzer Prize for Biography in 2004. He was born in New York City. ==Other websites== *Faculty page at Amherst College * * Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:American political scientists Category:Pulitzer Prize winners Category:Writers from New York City
title: William Taubman
